org.mindswap.query
Class ABoxQuery<V extends Variable>

java.lang.Object
  org.mindswap.query.ABoxQuery<V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Query<V>
public class ABoxQuery<V extends Variable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Query<V>

Simple implementation of so called ABox queries. ABox queries are a (possibly empty) conjunction of SWRL atoms. Furthermore, there are some limitations on ABox queries. First, the predicate in data property atoms and object property atoms can not be a variable. Second, the object of a class atom can not be a variable. (Those constraints are actually subject to be implemented by implementations of the interfaces.)

Parameters:
body - The set of SWRL atoms that make up the body of this query.
resultVars - The collection of result variables.

attach

public ABoxQuery<V> attach(OWLModel model)
Description copied from interface: Query
Re-attach this query to the given model. The query can be executed against this model afterwards.

Implementations may use this method for initial query optimization.

Specified by:
attach in interface Query<V extends Variable>
Parameters:
model - The target model.
Returns:
this for cascading, in particular, to enable convenient consecutive execution.

execute

public ClosableIterator<ValueMap<V,OWLValue>> execute(ValueMap<?,?> binding)
Description copied from interface: Query
Answer this query against the OWLModel to which it is attached and return an iterator over the results, containing for each result the projection variable(s) bound to their result value. An empty iterator (i.e. hasNext() returns false) indicates that there are no results in this model for the query. For an ASK query (having no result variable at all but a boolean result), the returned iterator has exactly one empty value map object if the query result is true and an empty iterator in case the result is false.

Note that execution of QueryLanguage.SPARQL_DL queries requires an appropriate reasoner (Pellet) to be attached to the OWLModel.

Specified by:
execute in interface Query<V extends Variable>
Returns:
An iterator of the query results.
